verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Where have all my children gone? It didn't seem I'd slept so long. All the beauty's gone away; It was here just yesterday.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Butterflies no longer sing, Faerie bells no longer ring. Gone the dancers of the mist; Mortals whom the gods once kissed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: No more riders in the sky. Never more shall dragons fly. Stranger can you tell me why All I've ever loved has died?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Who are you who walk this land? Death is happy in your hand. You pretend that I'm not real, Not believing what you feel.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I'm tempted to strike you down, Don again my crystal crown; Take you back to yesterday... But, instead, I think I'll just go away....
